lead_paragraph: General José Guillermo García, who was minister of defense in El Salvador in the 1980s, was deported after an immigration judge found he assisted in torture.

headline.print_headline: Florida: Ex-Leader of Salvadoran Military Deported
headline.main: Florida: Ex-Leader of Salvadoran Military Deported

snippet: General José Guillermo García, who was minister of defense in El Salvador in the 1980s, was deported after an immigration judge found he assisted in torture.
abstract: Authorities deport Gen Jose Guillermo Garcia, former minister of defense in El Salvador, after judge finds he had role in human rights violations in 1980s; Guillermo is arrested at his Florida home and transported to San Salvador.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
